item.title: About
item.description: Being the good cornfed American girl that I am, I didn’t learn a second language growing up. Most of us do just fine beating everyone over the head with our English and never thinking twice about it, but I ended up develop a nasty case of I now affectionately call monoglot anxiety: anxiety about having never learned to speak a second language, and anxiety around inevitably screwing up all the time if I did try to learn one.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
